data.why:
This is a request for a rename from AFOXSON to FOX. Per Andreas'
    instruction, I'm applying for this new PAUSE account, and will then
    pass all permissions to the new ID and start uploading new versions
    to the new ID. I'll then remove all of the files in the old account
    and retire it. Thank you.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (FOX; Adam J. Foxson)
